name: Robostrich 2099
description:
You're the pilot of an experimental ostrich bot, the first weaponized bird ever created.

Your goal is to test its combat capabilities in a controlled 2v2 environment vs other ostrich bot pilots. Utilize your keyboard / joypad controls to activate your jump-jets, roll around at the speed of sound, and use your kinematic bouncing power to maneuver around the dome environment and skewer your opponents on the pointed end of your giant lance.

Get ready to say "Bird Up!" to your opponents in Battle Bounce Revamped!

Controls;
1. Use the Left Stick / WASD Keys to move around
2. (A) / Space to jump (You have 2 more jumps once you're in the air)
3. (Y) / Left Shift to Lock Camera On Player
4. (X) / Tab to Switch Camera Lock Targets
